archimate:Node.name: [L1 Base] (T) OCS Driven Batch Daemon VM (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: This amount of compute needed to submit, monitor VM, and rendezvous with batch submision made to batch system. Jobs flow though this system and do not run on this system, nor are their inputs or output stored in this system in a permenant way. The OSC driven batch supports only knowledge of outstanding batch jobs.
